summary: This bill, the FACE Act Repeal Act of 2025, aims to repeal Section 248 of title 18 of the United States Code. This section currently prohibits actions that restrict access to clinic entrances. The bill also includes clerical amendments to reflect the repeal and specifies that the repeal applies to ongoing or future prosecutions related to this law. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives by Mr. Roy and several co-sponsors and was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
